verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to Ariel, <S%H740><s%> to Ariel, <S%H740><s%> the city <S%H7151><s%> where David <S%H1732><s%> dwelled! <S%H2583><s%> add <S%H5595><s%> you year <S%H8141><s%> to year; <S%H8141><s%> let them kill <S%H5362><s%> sacrifices. <S%H2282><s%>
Yet I will distress <S%H6693><s%> Ariel, <S%H740><s%> and there shall be heaviness <S%H8386><s%> and sorrow: <S%H592><s%> and it shall be to me as Ariel. <S%H740><s%>

And I will camp <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you round <S%H1754><s%> about, and will lay siege <S%H6696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you with a mount, <S%H4674><s%> and I will raise <S%H6965><s%> forts <S%H4694><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you.

And you shall be brought <S%H8213><s%> down, <S%H8213><s%> and shall speak <S%H1696><s%> out of the ground, <S%H776><s%> and your speech <S%H565><s%> shall be low <S%H7817><s%> out of the dust, <S%H6083><s%> and your voice <S%H6963><s%> shall be, as of one that has a familiar spirit, <S%H178><s%> out of the ground, <S%H776><s%> and your speech <S%H565><s%> shall whisper <S%H6850><s%> out of the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

Moreover the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of your strangers <S%H2114><s%> shall be like small <S%H1851><s%> dust, <S%H80><s%> and the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of the terrible <S%H6184><s%> ones shall be as chaff <S%H4671><s%> that passes <S%H5674><s%> away: yes, it shall be at an instant <S%H6621><s%> suddenly. <S%H6597><s%>

You shall be visited <S%H6485><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> with thunder, <S%H7482><s%> and with earthquake, <S%H7494><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> noise, <S%H6963><s%> with storm <S%H5492><s%> and tempest, <S%H5591><s%> and the flame <S%H3851><s%> of devouring <S%H398><s%> fire. <S%H784><s%>

And the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that fight <S%H6633><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Ariel, <S%H740><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> that fight <S%H6633><s%> against her and her fortification, <S%H4685><s%> and that distress <S%H6693><s%> her, shall be as a dream <S%H2472><s%> of a night <S%H3915><s%> vision. <S%H2377><s%>

It shall even be as when <S%H834><s%> an hungry <S%H7456><s%> man dreams, <S%H2492><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he eats; <S%H398><s%> but he wakes, <S%H6974><s%> and his soul <S%H5315><s%> is empty: <S%H7385><s%> or as when <S%H834><s%> a thirsty <S%H6771><s%> man dreams, <S%H2492><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he drinks; <S%H8354><s%> but he wakes, <S%H6974><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he is faint, <S%H5889><s%> and his soul <S%H5315><s%> has appetite: <S%H8264><s%> so <S%H3652><s%> shall the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> be, that fight <S%H6633><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

Stay <S%H4102><s%> yourselves, and wonder; <S%H8539><s%> cry <S%H8173><s%> you out, and cry: <S%H8173><s%> they are drunken, <S%H7937><s%> but not with wine; <S%H3196><s%> they stagger, <S%H5128><s%> but not with strong drink. <S%H7941><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has poured <S%H5258><s%> out on you the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of deep <S%H8639><s%> sleep, <S%H8639><s%> and has closed <S%H6105><s%> your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> and your rulers, <S%H7218><s%> the seers <S%H2374><s%> has he covered. <S%H3680><s%>

And the vision <S%H2380><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> is become <S%H1961><s%> to you as the words <S%H1697><s%> of a book <S%H5612><s%> that is sealed, <S%H2856><s%> which <S%H834><s%> men deliver <S%H5414><s%> to one that is learned, <S%H3045><s%> <S%H5612><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Read <S%H7121><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you: and he said, <S%H559><s%> I cannot; <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> for it is sealed: <S%H2856><s%>

And the book <S%H5612><s%> is delivered <S%H5414><s%> to him that is not learned, <S%H3045><s%> <S%H5612><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Read <S%H7121><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you: and he said, <S%H559><s%> I am not learned. <S%H3045><s%> <S%H5612><s%>

Why the Lord <S%H136><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> For as much <S%H3282><s%> <S%H365><s%> as this <S%H2063><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> draw near <S%H5066><s%> me with their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and with their lips <S%H8193><s%> do honor <S%H3513><s%> me, but have removed <S%H7368><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me, and their fear <S%H3374><s%> toward <S%H854><s%> me is taught <S%H3925><s%> by the precept <S%H4687><s%> of men: <S%H582><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will proceed <S%H3254><s%> to do a marvelous <S%H6381><s%> work <S%H6381><s%> among this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> even a marvelous <S%H6381><s%> work <S%H6381><s%> and a wonder: <S%H6382><s%> for the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of their wise <S%H2450><s%> men shall perish, <S%H6><s%> and the understanding <S%H998><s%> of their prudent <S%H995><s%> men shall be hid. <S%H5641><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that seek deep <S%H6009><s%> to hide <S%H5641><s%> their counsel <S%H6098><s%> from the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and their works <S%H4639><s%> are in the dark, <S%H4285><s%> and they say, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> us? and who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> us?

Surely <S%H518><s%> your turning <S%H2017><s%> of things upside down shall be esteemed <S%H2803><s%> as the potter's <S%H3335><s%> clay: <S%H2563><s%> for shall the work <S%H4639><s%> say <S%H559><s%> of him that made <S%H6213><s%> it, He made <S%H6213><s%> me not? or shall the thing framed <S%H3336><s%> say <S%H559><s%> of him that framed <S%H3335><s%> it, He had no <S%H3808><s%> understanding? <S%H995><s%>

Is it not yet <S%H5750><s%> a very <S%H4213><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> while, and Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall be turned <S%H7725><s%> into a fruitful <S%H3759><s%> field, and the fruitful <S%H3759><s%> field shall be esteemed <S%H2803><s%> as a forest? <S%H3293><s%>

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the deaf <S%H2795><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the book, <S%H5612><s%> and the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the blind <S%H5787><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> out of obscurity, <S%H652><s%> and out of darkness. <S%H2822><s%>

The meek <S%H6035><s%> also shall increase <S%H3254><s%> their joy <S%H8057><s%> in the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the poor <S%H34><s%> among men <S%H120><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For the terrible <S%H6184><s%> one is brought <S%H656><s%> to nothing, <S%H656><s%> and the scorner <S%H3887><s%> is consumed, <S%H3615><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that watch <S%H8245><s%> for iniquity <S%H205><s%> are cut <S%H3772><s%> off:

That make a man <S%H120><s%> an offender <S%H2398><s%> for a word, <S%H1697><s%> and lay a snare <S%H6983><s%> for him that reproves <S%H3198><s%> in the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and turn <S%H5186><s%> aside <S%H5186><s%> the just <S%H6662><s%> for a thing of nothing. <S%H8414><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> redeemed <S%H6299><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall not now <S%H6258><s%> be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall his face <S%H6440><s%> now wax pale. <S%H2357><s%>

But when <S%H3588><s%> he sees <S%H7200><s%> his children, <S%H3206><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands, <S%H3027><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of him, they shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> my name, <S%H8034><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and shall fear <S%H6206><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

They also that erred <S%H8582><s%> in spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall come <S%H3045><s%> to understanding, <S%H998><s%> and they that murmured <S%H7279><s%> shall learn <S%H3925><s%> doctrine. <S%H3948><s%>
